attributes.action: Repatriate the heads of Ambuya Nehanda and Sekuru Kaguvi back to Zimbabwe.
attributes.additional_details: It is inhumane to keep heads of human beings as a trophy.   It is an embarrassment to the British nation to not do the right thing.  The last request of Ambuya Nehanda was to be buried in her homeland.
attributes.background: These freedom fighters were killed and then beheaded and the human beings heads put on display in a British museum.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the Trustees of the relevant museum, who are responsible for its collection.
